actions.committee: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued honoring Bil Keane.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued by the United States Postal Service in honor of Bil Keane (a cartoonist best known for the "Family Circus" comic strip).

titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued honoring Bil Keane.
